oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Artist in Residence - Connie Smith - 2011-08-29
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Connie Smith; Marty Stuart; Kostas; Dallas Frazier;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Performances include; You And Me; Tiny Blue Transistor Radio; Where Is My Castle; I'm Not Blue; Blame It On Your Heart (Kostas); That Makes Two Of Us; Singing The Blues; Long Line Of Heartaches; I'll Never Get Over Loving You; Constantly; Unidentified song-possibly If You're Gonna Go, Then Take Me With You; Farmer's Blues; reading of poem by Merle Haggard; I Met My Baby At The Choctaw Fair (Marty Stuart); Looking For A Reason; Blue Heartaches; Ain't Love A Good Thing; Run Away Little Tears; Fourteen Carat Mind (Dallas Frazier); If My Heart Had Windows (Dallas Frazier); All I Have To Offer You (Is Me) (Dallas Frazier); What's A Heart Like You; Peace In The Valley; Once A Day;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Smith, Connie, 1941-; Kostas, 1949-; Frazier, Dallas, 1939-; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
